verses.1: Topa zahtakin ama thu a zui mi khempeuh thupha ngah mi ahi hi.
verses.2: Na khut tawh na sep thaman na ne dinga, na lungdamin na maavang ding hi.
verses.3: Nangma inn sungah na zi, a gah pha mahmah leenggui tawh kibang dinga, na sabuai kiimah a tu na tate, oliv no dawng hilhhelh tawh kibang ding uh hi.
verses.4: En un, Topa a zahtak mi tua bangin thupha kipia ding hi.
verses.5: Topa in Zion panin nang thupha hong pia henla, na nuntak sung tawntung Jerusalem º nopsakna mu ta in.
verses.6: Na tute a mu dingin hong siam tahen. Israel tungah nopna om tahen!
